rules_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have more than 100 cards in your library, you may sacrifice Apeirohedron. If you do, create an X/X blue Alien creature token, where X is the difference.
flavor_text:
[i]“So an alien polyhedron walks into a bar, and the barman says—hey, why the infinite faces?”
“Don't quit your day job, Flash.”[/i]
